entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
